Sent: Mon, 05 Aug 2019 08:46:28 -0400
Subject: Jeffrey Epstein, 76318-054
From: [b(6), b(7)C] <[b(6)]@gmail.com>
To: [b(6), b(7)C] @bop.gov>

Mr. [b(6), b(7)C]

I understand that Mr. Epstein has not yet had the opportunity to establish a telephone account. Unit Mgr. [b(6)] (or [b(6)]) began the process last week, but did not have a chance to finish it. If you could arrange for someone to help Mr. Epstein set up the account, we'd really appreciate it.

Thank you for all your help.

[b(6), b(7)C]
